content:
Dear all,
A1 Digital is willing to support research institutions with the possibility to use the A1 Digital Machine Learning Platform powered by BigML for up to 6 months free of charge for Covid-19 research activities.
The Platform allows you to create and validate models for prediction, clustering, classification, anomaly detection and association, quickly and with a quite user friendly interface.
We are organising a demo of the available services, if you are willing to participate please send an email to: covid19@claire-ai.org with your name and position by 30th June.

https://www.a1.digital/en-de/landing-pages/stunde-der-digitalisierung-2020/machine-learning-against-covid-19/

Machine Learning as game changer: Digital vs. Covid-19
Machine Learning can provide research institutes with important insights to effectively counter Covid-19.
